Text: How was your little grab ass weekend with the Angel of Death Sorry to hear about the house I know what a bummer it is to lose a contract Hopefully someone else will come along and take it off your hands Are you still considering renting it or are you committed to selling My sister gave birth last weekend to a little boy however he was about months premature Were all pulling for him but it is still touch and go at this point School is challenging but interesting and the flying is awesome so Im pretty happy Bought a used BMW motorcycle yesterday a off of the original owner Its a classic and will give me something to tinker with on the weekends Hope all is well Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class

Chump Heres the cars Id look at if I were you Acura CSL i Coupe Passat V Volvo S or S w twin Turbo Audi AA Maxima whatever the top of the line is always top rated by Car and Driver If you want American Iron Id look at the Chrylser M My uncle is a huge driver and loves it Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class

REDrive em both but at least for the older ones the cyl was MUCH smoother It really comes down to what you want Unless youre really pushing it you wont notice much of a difference However what you will notice is that the cyl will be working a lot harder ie louder Once you jump into the youre in the luxury market and you probably want a smoother car with plenty of torque cyl Especially the way you drive not winding the engine out in every gear youll feel more low end power in the Again it comes down to the pax If youre hauling most of the time the is probably fine hauling it will be sucking wind a bit Remember when youre on a test drive the car isnt configured the way it will be in real life The tires will be under inflated the gas tank large in that car like gal pounds and no passengers so your performance will seem better My best advice when looking at cars in that price range is to insist on an extended overnight or over a weekend test drive of both You dont want to buy and wish you had bought the other a couple of weeks later Finally think about long term kids etc if you plan on hanging onto it as long as the Miata Its not uncommon for a bimmer to go miles without engine work so you can hang onto them for quite a while if you stay up on the maintenance Give me a buzz at home tonight if you want to yap about it Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday October PM To Conway Frank P Subject RE What do you think about the Isnt it basically the same thing as the except its bigger If so does it handle as well with the added size and weight Original Message From Conway Frank P mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Ruscitti Kevin Subject RE Kev Real quick on the cars The beamer is real tight in the back seat Think about how often you might be hauling people If you think its a factor spend some time on an extended test drive sitting in the back Id still look at the Vovlvo S twin turbo it might surprise you Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday October AM To Conway Frank P Subject RE I was at the game last night sitting in home run territory section It was one of the most disappointing games ive ever attended the astros dont even deserve to make the playoffs after their cowardly play the managers an idiot intentionally walking Bonds with guys on st and nd with outs Anyway in terms of the Miata the dealer recommended abt worth of work Of course i told him to just get the thing running The problem is the blue book value is only so i cant see putting another grand into it Ill probably just sell it to someone who races miatas which is really big in Texas or donate it to charity and take the tax write off We havent test driven anything yet but it looks like were leaning toward the BMW i It seems to get great reviews the main downside is that its a little small but still sporty Well go for test drives this weekend and should buy or lease still undecided something in the next couple weeks Hows everything on your front Less classroom time and more flying time That faggot Lowery was in Austin this past weekend I dont expect him to call of course but it shows how easily he couldve gotten to Houston while he was working for mos in Dallas Later kevin Original Message From Conway Frank P mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Ruscitti Kevin Subject RE Some idiot lost a pair of pliers so I have to wait around to go fly I guess its just as well Id hate to find them at Sorry to hear about the turbo Miata What happened to it Cant it be fixed or are you just abandoning it Where are you leaning in terms of a new car On my end the classic motorcycle is buzzing like a champ and a complete blast to drive Whats with the faggot Astros walking your boy At least he pocketed one record I dont have TJs email w me but Im sure he never expected you to actually show up in the first place Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Tuesday October AM To Conway Frank P Subject RE Conway Do you have TJs new email address I want to let him know I wont be out there in Oct Give me a shout Hows everything going My miata broke down this past weekend I didnt think it would be that soon It looks like Im forced to buy a new car Im not looking forward to the process although the internet should make it less painful than it was years ago Wow I cant believe Ive owned the Miata for over yrs Im going to see Bonds play on Wednesday night Hoping hell be going for the record that night either a tie or to break it I scored tix in section prime bonds territory Check out the section on the Houston Astros website Talk to you soon KR Original Message From Conway Frank P mailto Sent Friday September PM To Ruscitti Kevin Subject RE Yeah Ill probably still go but I was planning on the first weekend being w the fellas Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Friday September PM To Conway Frank P Subject RE if i cancel youre still going out to meet up w Denise right Original Message From Conway Frank P mailto Sent Friday September AM To Ruscitti Kevin Subject Fag boy Let me know if you are definitely canceling for Cali so I can set up other plans Capt Frank P RE VChump I think UCLA is playing Washington on the th of Oct Want to try to catch it Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Tuesday September AM To Conway Frank P Subject RE V That test pilot actually lived I saw an interview with him on minutes Needless to say hes not a fan of the Osprey Original Message From Conway Frank P mailto Sent Tuesday September AM To Ruscitti Kevin Brian Lowery Email Todd Johnson Email Subject FW V Thought you guys might want a little must see TV this morning Yeah the life insurance is paid up Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Gallegro John C Sent Friday August PM To Conway Frank P Subject V V Crashavi This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RELast night was the game to catch Where your seats near where the homer dropped I think the is the better call You really dont want a BMW as a family car anyway until the kids are much older I dont know what the prices are but the ic is pretty sweet Capt Frank P Conway Sissy USNTPS Class Original Message From Ruscitti Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Friday October AM To Conway Frank P Subject RE Thanks for the advice Much appreciated We plan on test driving this weekend The BMW has a racing track in the back of the dealership I heard its pretty sweet I have a feeling were going to lean toward the i just bc everything Ive read rates it the best in its class I feel like the series will be too big for us right now wo kids but we should get a better feel this weekend Ill keep you informed
